petBios: Loves belly rubs and stealing socks.
Professional napper. Will work for treats.

Queen of the house. Tolerates humans occasionally.

Scared of thunderstorms but brave around vacuum cleaners.
Enjoys long walks and rolling in mud.
Has never met a stranger. Loves everyone.
Rescued from the street, now the most spoiled pet ever.
Spends 90% of the day sleeping. The rest eating.
Best cuddler in the whole neighborhood.
Very food motivated. Knows exactly when dinner time is.
Likes to sit on keyboards and interrupt video calls.
Fastest zoomies in the west.
Old soul with a puppy heart.
Part-time model, full-time couch potato.
Certified good boy/girl since birth.
Will trade tricks for snacks anytime.
Convinced the red dot will be caught one day.
